name: Rock Bottom (TotallyQuackers1)
description:
Controls: left and right arrows to move, Spacebar to jump, P to pause, Shift to run

This game is a project i made for my games design course at Priestley College

This is only 1 stage of a game as practice.

It is a 2D platformer game with a life system

The game takes place in a cave however there are creatures and traps in the game but you cannot fight all you can do is run and jump till you find the exit

Just download the file and extract the file contents and run RockBottom.exe
